description: Erection of rear dormer extension and installation front and rear rooflights; replacement of front and rear ground and first floor front windows with new windows and replace rear first floor rear door with new door.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">A minimum of 1 Swift Nesting Brick and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-747bb24f-7fff-1a4a-d06b-6836dc0c17ff"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interests of biodiversity.</span></p>

<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Details, including samples, of materials to be used on the building, boundary walls and ground surfaces shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before any work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:14787,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;4&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:16711680},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;10&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:3,&quot;3&quot;:1},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;16&quot;:12}" style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">Details, including samples, of materials to be used on the building, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before the relevant work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved</span>.</span></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the char</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;">acter and visual amenity of the area.</span><br></p>
